abstract: Bill Cunningham shares photos of women in and around New York City wearing winter coats in beautiful colors and patterns.
lead_paragraph: The richness of colors, particularly pastels and flower patterns on winter coats, often reflects the hidden treasures of gemstones and of vegetables sliced open, revealing an intense color inside.
snippet: The richness of colors, particularly pastels and flower patterns on winter coats, often reflects the hidden treasures of gemstones and of vegetables sliced open, revealing an intense color inside.
